column5: i looked on coreys facebook and he and his wife went out yesterday and hammered the huge bass....corey picked up a 6lb largemouth...thats so awesome definitly hiring him when i get there...hopefully he can get me some of that action....cant wait so excited

Headed for the Minaki area myself in a month....hoping to run into No one...... nothing personal...just looking for a little alone time.feel free to stop by Big north lodge after fishing though for a cold one.
